resources.string: Akukho App ifunyenweyo ukuvula le fayile
Ukucima ezi zinto zingezantsi ziya kuzisusa ngokusisigxina kwisixhobo sakho kwaye azikwazi kufunyanwa kwakhona.
Ufuna ukuseta umendo wangoku njengekhaya lale thebhu?
Seta umbala we icon emileyo. Ayikhupheli ngaphezulu umbala we icon yolawulo.
Kwisixhobo esineengcambu kuphela. Yijonge kuphela ukuba uqinisekile ngayo.
Utshintsho luya kwenzeka emva kokuba uqalise ngokutsha usetyenziso
Bonisa umhla kunye nexesha lokugqibela lolungiso
Bonisa ubungakanani beefayile kunye nenani lezinto ezikwiifolda
Unotshintsho olungagcinwanga, uyafuna ukulugcina phambi kokuba uphume?
Le yindawo yokugcina. Leliphi inyathelo ongathanda ukulenza?
Le sisifakeli sephakheji. Leliphi inyathelo ongathanda ukulenza?
Sebenzisa ii-ayikhoni ezisetyhula kwimifanekiso kunye neevidiyo
Yenza ukukhangela ngasemva ngokwesiko phezulu kuluhlu
Le yinkqubo ye-app, ukuyicima kunokukhokelela ekungazinzini kwenkqubo.\nQhubeka?
Iifayili ezingoovimba ziya kukhutshwa kule folda. Ixabiso elimiselweyo luluhlu apho uvimba ukhoyo.
Xa uqalisa, eyona folda isandulâ€™ ukubonwa kwithebhu nganye iya kuboniswa
Nokuba ibar yokukhangela yenkqubo inombala ngesikhumba
Seta umbala kwizinto ezinkulu ze-UI yethebhu yasekhohlo
Seta umbala kwi-FAB kunye nezinye izinto ezincinci ze-UI
I-App ifuna imvume yokugcina ukuze iqhubeke. Ukurhoxisa le ncoko yababini kuya kuphuma kwi-app.
Khangela usebenzisa isimbo se-BASH sokuthetha rhoqo
Ukuba isetiwe, intetho eqhelekileyo iya kudityaniswa nalo lonke igama lefayile, iya kukhangela isenzeko ngenye indlela.
Seta umbala kwizinto ezinkulu ze-UI yethebhu elungileyo
Xela iibugs okanye ucele into entsha

Ufikelela njani kwifolda yeWindows ekwabelwana ngayo kwi-Android (SMB)


Vula ukwabelana ngeFayile kwiWindows

Vula iPhaneli yoLawulo, cofa Khetha iQela lasekhaya kunye neenketho zokwabelana phantsi kweNethiwekhi kunye ne-Intanethi, kwaye ucofe u- "Tshintsha iiSetingi zoKwabelana eziPhezulu," yenza "Ifayile kunye Ukwabelana Ngesishicileli".


Iisetingi ezongezelelweyo zoKwabiwa kweeFayile

Ungafuna nokuqwalasela ezinye izahlulo zolwabelwano izicwangciso apha. 
 Umzekelo, ungenza ukufikelela kwiifayile zakho ngaphandle kwegama lokugqitha ukuba ubathemba bonke izixhobo kwinethiwekhi yakho yasekhaya. Nje ukuba ifayile kunye nokwabelana ngomshicileli kwenziwe, unako vula iFayile Explorer okanye Windows Explorer, cofa ekunene kwifolda ofuna ukwabelana ngayo, kunye khetha Iimpahla. 
 Cofa iqhosha elithi Yabelana kwaye wenze ifolda ifumaneke kwinethiwekhi.


Qinisekisa ukuba zombini izixhobo zikwiWifi enye

Eli nqaku lenza iifayile zifumaneke kwinethiwekhi yendawo, ngoko ke iPC yakho kunye nezixhobo eziphathwayo kufuneka ibekwinethiwekhi yendawo enye. Awukwazi ukufikelela kwifolda yeWindows ekwabelwana ngayo kwi-Intanethi okanye xa i-smartphone yakho iqhagamshelwe kwidatha yayo yeselula â€” yona kufuneka iqhagamshelwe kwi-Wi-Fi.


Fumana idilesi yeIP

Vula i-Command Prompt. Chwetheza 'ipconfig' kwaye ucinezele u-Enter. Khangela iSango eliMiselweyo phantsi kweadaptha yenethiwekhi yakho yedilesi ye-IP yomzila wakho. Njonga i \"IPv4 Idilesi\" phantsi kwecandelo elifanayo leadaptha ukufumana i-IP yekhompyuter yakho idilesi.


Ngenisa iinkcukacha kwibhokisi yencoko yababini ye-SMB
Kuya kufuneka ukope le fayile kwindawo yokugcina ukuze uyivule
Zifihle ngokuzenzekelayo ibha yesixhobo ngelixa uskrola
Seta igama lokugqitha elingundoqo loguqulelo oluntsonkothileyo. Shiya ungenanto ukuze uyisuse.
Cebisa, xa utshintsha ipateni yakho yokhuseleko ukusuka Useto lwenkqubo, awuzukwazi ukuguqulela ngokuntsonkothileyo lo mxholo.
Iplagi ye-Amaze Cloud ayifunyenwanga. Nceda ukhuphele kwi-Play Store.
Ayiphumelelanga ukulayisha umdibaniso. Nceda uvule i-Amaze Cloud kube kanye.
Ikhonkco ekwabelwana ngalo kukotshwe kwibhodi eqhotyoshwayo
Ukuphelelwa ngaphandle kwe inkumbulo, nceda ucime ezinye RAM
Ibha yendlela yokucofa ixesha elide ukuchwetheza indlela eqhelekileyo
Ikuvumela ukuba uvule iifayile kwimisebenzi eyahlukeneyo. Zifikelele kwiscreen samva nje senkqubo.
Izaziso zoMphathi weFayile yeFTP\'s Izaziso zeseva
Ayiphumelelanga ukulayisha iifayile. Nceda ujonge uqhagamshelwano lwakho.

Ubunyani bamamkeli '%1$s' abunakumiselwa.

%2$s isitshixo somnwe yi-%3$s.
 
Nceda ucofe "Ewe" ukuze uqinisekise isazisi; kungenjalo, nceda ucofe "Hayi".
Ukusilela kwelogon: Ayinakuqinisekisa ngegama lomsebenzisi elinikiweyo kunye ne-password.
Ukusilela kwelogon: Ayinakuqinisekisa ngegama lomsebenzisi elinikezelweyo kunye nesitshixo sabucala.

KUNENZA UKUBA UMNTU UKHONA! UKWENZA INTO EBUHLUNGU!

Umntu unokukuva ngoku (uhlaselo lomntu ophakathi)! Kwakhona kunokwenzeka ukuba iqhosha lokusingatha lisanda kutshintshwa. Umnwe weqhosha likawonke-wonke elithunyelwe ngumamkeli okude awuhambelani naleyo igcinwe kwi-Amaze.

Nceda uqhagamshelane nomphathi wakho wenkqubo okanye usete uqhagamshelo olutsha ukuze uqhubeke nokuqhagamshela kwiseva.
Ukudala iindlela ezimfutshane azixhaswa sisindululi sakho.
Kuyacetyiswa ukuba usebenzise \". txt\" njengolwandiso lwefayile.
Ayikho idekhowuda esebenzayo yokususa ukuntsonkotha kwePEM.
Ayiphumelelanga ukugqibezela. hlaziya ungeniso loguqulelo oluntsonkothileyo kwisiseko sedatha
Ingakwazi\' t, nceda uvule kwakhona kusetyenziso lokugqibela
Kukho into engahambanga kakuhle, akukho nto yokuvula
Ifayile inde kakhulu kwaye ayinakuhlelwa, nangona kunjalo ungafunda amagama okuqala %d

I-AESCrypt yifomati yefayile yomthombo ovulekileyo yoguqulelo olusekwe kwi-AES encryption. Iyaphatheka kwakhona, inokukhutshwa ngokuntsonkotha ngeenkqubo zeAESCrypt kwamanye amaqonga.

Iwebhusayithi yeAESCrypt

I-Maze\'s iFomathi yoNguqulelo nayo isekwe kuguqulelo oluntsonkothileyo lwe-AES; kodwa yahlukile kwifomathi ye-AESCrypt, inokukhutshelwa kuphela ngesi sixhobo; kananjalo akufunekanga ukhuphe i-Amaze File Manager kwesi sixhobo okanye utshintshe indlela otshixa ngayo isikrini, kungenjalo awuyi kuba nandlela yokubuyisela ifayile efihliweyo.
Iifayile ezintsonkothileyo kufuneka zisebenzise \".aze\" njengolwandiso lwefayile.
Ifayile eyenziweyo iya kufihlwa kuluhlu lwefayile.
I-App idinga imvume yokufakela ii-apps ziqhubeke.
Ezinye iifayile kwindawo yokugcina azikwazi ukutsalwa; ugcino lungonakala okanye luphume kwimvelaphi engalunganga.
Ngoku ngoku uza kuya kwisixokelelwano sefayile ye-Android ngenxa yezizathu zokhuseleko. Nceda ukhethe isixhobo se-USB kuluhlu olusekhohlo.
Ayikwazi vula indawo yokugcina \"%s\". Mhlawumbi asinakuvula uvimba, okanye uvimba wonakaliswe.

KUSESENZEKA UKUBA UMNTU WENZA INTO EBI!

Kungenzeka ukuba kukho umntu ophulaphuleyo ngoku (indoda ephakathi)! Kusengenzeka nokuba isitshixo somququzeleli sisandula kutshintshwa. kuba isitshixo sikawonke-wonke esithunyelwe ngumamkeli okude alihambelani nelo ligcinwe kwi-Mazeze.

Ungaqhubeleka nohlaziyo lweminwe yeminwe okanye ucime uhlaziyo lwezicwangciso zoqhagamshelo lwe-SSH.
Ezinye iifayile aziphumelelanga ngenxa yokunganyaniseki ukusebenza
Nceda ujonge ukuba ingaba umba oxoxa ngokungqubana kwakho sele ukhona na.
Ingxelo yokuwa phantsi ikhutshelwe ibhodi eqhotyoshwayo
Khubaza ukukhangela kokusayinwa kwe-IPC (Ukwenzela abancedisi belifa be-SMBv1 - UNGAKHUSELEKANGA!)
Ukuba yenziwe, isebenzisa indlela yelifa ukudwelisa iifayile
uvimba we-RAR \"%s\" awuxhaswanga nguvimba we-RAR v5.
Kuza kufuneka uqalise kwakhona iseva ye-FTP ukuze utshintsho lwenzeke.
Chukumisa kwaye utsale ukuhambisa okanye ukukopa iifayile

Ekubeni oku kukusebenza kwakho kokuqala kweseva yeFTP, kwaye usebenzisa ugcino lwangaphakathi lwesixhobo njengefolda ekwabelwana ngayo, nceda uvumele i-Amaze ifikelele kwindawo yokugcina usebenzisa. SAF.\n\n
Kufuneka wenze oku kube kanye kuphela, kude kube lixesha elizayo xa ukhetha indawo entsha yokwabelana.

Ukusukela kwi-Android 10, i-Android yayibeke imida kubalawuli abathile, kwaye kufuneka bafikelele ngeSakhelo sokuFikelela kuGcino.\n \nNceda uvumele i-Amaze ifikelele kulawulo olusuka kumphathi wefayile yenkqubo ngokucofa \"Vumela ufikelelo\".
Vula oku kwinkxaso yokusebenzisa ugcino lwangaphandle lwesixhobo kwiinguqulelo ezintsha ze-Android

iseva ye-FTP indlela ekwabelwana ngayo ibuyiselwe kugcino lwangaphakathi njengoko ubuyela umva ukuphunyezwa kwendlela yefayile yelifa. Nceda ukhethe indlela entsha usebenzisa imenyu ephezulu ngasekunene njengoko kuyimfuneko.
Iseva yeFTP indlela ekwabelwana ngayo ibuyiselwe kugcino lwangaphakathi
Ukhetha indlela efuna ukufikelela kweengcambu. Nceda uvule umhloli weengcambu kwizicwangciso ukuba isixhobo sakho similiselwe.

Ukhetha indlela efuna ufikelelo lwengcambu, eyenza imisebenzi yokufunda/ukubhala kuyo yonke inkqubo yefayile kwisixhobo sakho, kwaye kuyingozi-iimpazamo zokungakhathali isitena isixhobo sakho!\n\nUqinisekile?
Ifayile ayikwazanga vulwa kusetyenziswa le app
Yenza uqhagamshelo lukaGoogle Driveâ„¢ ukuze ulawule iifayile ezisuka ngaphakathi koMphathi weFayile oMangalisayo.
Impazamo ngokulanda uluhlu lwemveliso Udlalo lukaGoogle.

Ukusukela kwi-Android 11, uGoogle ucela abaphathi beFayile ukuba bacele imvume yomsebenzisi yokulawula zonke iifayile kwisixhobo. Iinkcukacha apha. 

Mangalisa uMphathi weFayile ufuna le mvume naye. Emva kokucofa u-"Grant"apha, nceda ukhethe Vumela ufikelelo ukulawula zonke iifayile kwiscreen esilandelayo. 

Ukurhoxisa le ncoko yababini kuya kuphuma kwi-app.
Lungisa umxholo, imibala kunye nenkangeleko yomphathi wefayile.
Lawula ukuba loluphi ulwazi oluza kuboniswa, yenza ngokwezifiso ibar esecaleni, kwaye uguqule i-UI ekhethwayo
Guqula isimilo esifana nophendlo oluphambili nokuba uvule iifayile njengomsebenzi omtsha
Seta igama eliyimfihlo kunye noguqulelo oluntsonkothileyo

Uthunyelwa kwi-Amaze File Utilities. Yi-app yethu yomthombo ovulekileyo ene-audio/ividiyo/imifanekiso/ababukeli bamaxwebhu, ikuvumela ukuba uhlalutye iifayile ezingafunekiyo ukuze ukhulule ugcino, ugqithise ngokukhawuleza usebenzisa iWifi P2P nokunye okuninzi.\nNceda usixhase ngokuyizama.
Enkosi ngokufakela i-Amaze File Utilities. Uthunyelwa kwi-app.
Ngokwemigaqo yomgaqo-nkqubo kaGoogle Play, ii-apps azivumelekanga ukuba zizihlaziye ngokwazo. Nceda uhlaziye i-app esuka kuDlalo lukaGoogle.
Akukwazi ukufumana ulwazi lwepakethe kwifayile \"%s\". Nokuba ifayile echaziweyo ayiyo APK, okanye ifayile yephakheji yonakele.
Cela uqinisekiso phambi kokucima iifayile. Ukuyekisa oku akukhuthazwa kakhulu!
Ukuthumela ngaphandle akuphumelelanga: ayikwazanga kubhala ifayile yogcino
Ukuthathwa ngaphandle akuphumelelanga: ayikwazanga ukufunda ugcino ifayile
I-Plugin ye-Amaze Cloud ayixhaswanga nge-F- Inguqulelo ye-Droid. Nceda usebenzise iVenkile yoDlalo lweVenkile ye-Amaze.
Ikhubaza abadlali bemidiya abakhelwe ngaphakathi kumkhethi wefayile
Akukho app ifunyenweyo yokusingatha le njongo. unayo i-DocumentsUI efakiweyo?
Ngelishwa, asikwazanga ukususa iinkcukacha zakho zoqhagamshelo kwilifu kwi-schema yedatha entsha, kwaye kuye kwafuneka sizisuse kwi-app. Nceda uyile uxhulumaniso lwamafu kwakhona.
